line_1: And lost, at once, to Shame and Gratitude;
line_2: And, lest Posterity should think us rude,

line_1: Shall break the ties of truth and gratitude,
line_2: To sooth our rage, the temporising brood

line_1: The cheerful earth resounds with gratitude,
line_2: Returning she should miss the pathway rude.
'And from the rest I pray exclude
